TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SendParametersContent extends System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendContent
Public NotInheritable Class SendParametersContent Inherits SendContent

Docs.summary: Enables sending data to or from a workflow service in the form of parameters.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendParametersContent> is interoperable with regular WCF clients and services. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendParametersContent> collection is similar to the argument declaration on a C# method signature.The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendParametersContent> collection cannot contain an argument that is a message contract or of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>. Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent> for these types of data.
